examples.example: 当别人遇到困难时，我总是很乐意帮忙。

translate.english: When others encounter difficulties, I am always very willing to help.

examples.example: 在朋友需要帮忙的时候，我会毫不犹豫地伸出援手。

translate.english: When friends need help, I will not hesitate to lend a helping hand.

examples.example: 当邻居有需要时，我总是很开心能去帮忙。

translate.english: When the neighbor is in need, I am always very happy to be able to help.
